forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening mixing with snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
